title: Organizational Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Energy Efficiency Improvement for Dome Structures in Arid Climates

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Build an energy simulation model with 80% accuracy to analyze thermal performance of dome structures in arid climates
Compare the performance of three or more cladding systems through parametric modeling applying a multi-objective optimization function (energy cost + material cost)
Predict energy consumption patterns based on design variables using machine learning (multivariate polynomial regression) and propose optimal material combinations (aluminum/polycarbonate)
Derive final design proposals per team in PBL environments and quantitatively evaluate energy efficiency improvements of over 4% compared to conventional single-material systems
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
